```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
library(readxl)

```

```{r}
soil_quality <- read_excel("C:/Users/Christopher Vest/Documents/Land_use_project/Land_use/Review/Christopher/soil_quality/Soil_Quality_Analysis.xlsx")

```

```{r Goochland}
ggplot(soil_quality, aes(x = reorder(`G_Value`, `G_Area_acre`), y = `G_Area_acre`, fill = `G_Area_acre`)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position = "none") +     scale_fill_viridis() + labs( title = "Total Acreage by Soil Quality Classification", y = "Acreage", x = "Soil Quality Classification")
```

```{r Powhatan}
ggplot(soil_quality, aes(x = reorder(`P_Value`, `P_Area_acre`), y = `P_Area_acre`, fill = `P_Area_acre`)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position = "none") +     scale_fill_viridis() + labs( title = "Total Acreage by Soil Quality Classification", y = "Acreage", x = "Soil Quality Classification")
```
